name: Rubik's Cube (itch) (Srybe, SupaDruide)
description:
Rubik's Cube is a PC game made on Unity 3D

You can choose the size of the cube from 2 to 10.

You can also choose the size of the shuffle from 1 to 100.

Controls: 

  • Rotate the cube : Hold the right mouse button + movement
  • Rotate a face :  Hold the left mouse button + movement
  • Zoom In/Out : Wheel mouse
